name: RI_1_1_15_Restore_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.15 Restore Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Restore Record Entries from archive (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to recreate record entries and their content from a previous created archive artefact. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.15.

statement.label: RI.1.1.15#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to restore (previously archived) Record Entries according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
